name: The Boss (greenphox, PerfectGamer)
description:
A simple game made for Jame Gam #26. 
move with WASD, and shoot the enemies with Left click! 

You can auto-fire by pressing the left-click. You can press the button "Deck" in the top-right corner to see your deck.
  
It was made by greenphox (coding and graphics) and Nananeos (music and SFX).

We hope you enjoy our game!


The graphics,  music,  coding and most fonts were created inside the jam period.
Some fonts and most sound effects weren't created in the jam period.
